name: MEMEory Game
description:
MEMEory  is simple puzzle game where u have to flip the similar memes ,  only 0.2% of players did finish the game probably cos the background make them dizzy *troll* .. let's see what you  can do 

GAME RULES:
    • If you display similaire images you will gain :
    • 4 extra points for your score
    • 10 extra seconds for your time
    • If you display different images you will loose :
    • 2 points from your score
    • 5 seconds from your time
  • Your final score is the addition of the level score and the time left (Levelscore+TimeLeft)
  • Even if you have the required score you wont win without displaying all the images

PS: to listen to the soundtrack make sure to enable video auto play on chrome browser

Music : you can find here the orignal mix of the sound track
